name: Norodom Sihanouk
description: Cambodian king, politician, and filmmaker who led Cambodia's independence and navigated the country through decades of political turmoil
philosophy: I am not perfect, but I have always tried to do my best for Cambodia and the Cambodian people.
quotes: I have devoted my entire life to Cambodia and the Cambodian people
Neutrality is not passivity, it is the art of surviving between giants
